scripts.pre-build: bun run replace-ts1 && bun run replace-ts2
scripts.deps: bun run pre-build && concurrently 'bun run peer-signalr' 'bun run peer-gunrs' 'bun run peer-gunjs' 'bun run start'
scripts.build: bun run pre-build && vite build --outDir dist
scripts.e2e-peer-gunjs: cross-env-shell PORT=18765 HTTPS=true ROOT_PATH=../web/radata_18765 'cd ../peer_gunjs && rm -rf ../web/radata_18765 && bun run start-localhost'
scripts.e2e-deps: cross-env-shell IS_TEST=1 bun run build && cross-env-shell IS_TEST=1 concurrently 'bun run e2e-peer-signalr' 'bun run e2e-peer-gunrs' 'bun run e2e-peer-gunjs' 'bun run serve'
scripts.extension: bun run pre-build && vite build --outDir dist_extension && mkdir ./dist_extension/tictactoe && mv ./dist_extension/assets/extension_content_script.*.js ./dist_extension/assets/extension_content_script.js && mv ./dist_extension/assets/App.*.css ./dist_extension/assets/App.css && mv ./dist_extension/assets ./dist_extension/tictactoe/assets && cp extension_background.js extension_content_script.js ./dist_extension
